rules_text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, they lose X life and you surveil X, where X is the number of equipment attached to this creature.

OG_3:


OG_2:
Creatures you control are affected by equipment twice. (E.g. If an equipment attached to a creature you control would give it +2/+1, it gives it +4/+2 instead.)


OG_1:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, if Bladeguy (new name) is equipped, it deals 1 damage to them and you scry 1.
